places_with_reviews.name: Tank More, Balurghat, Dakshin Dinajpur.
places_with_reviews.address: Bhanumati Rd, Tank More, Balurghat, West Bengal 733101, India

reviews.text: The location where the statue stands is a convergence point for two major roads, making it easily accessible to all who wish to visit. The significance of this monument merits proper upkeep to ensure its lasting impact on our collective memory.
Tank More at Balurghat town, is a historical place. The tank that was took part in 1971 war is situated in this place.
Indian tank standing here, this tank is used in indo pak war in 1971
Some times seat not available if you start your journey from here by bus.
Nostalgic. Still maintained as 20 yrs ago. Only some Shops has come up.

places_with_reviews.name: Gouriya Math
places_with_reviews.address: 6QMP+WG3, SH 10, West Dinajpur, Balurghat, West Bengal 733101, India

reviews.text: Sacred Radha Govinda temple in the centre of Balurghat and every year Mela is held here on account of the auspicious Jhulan Yatra of Sri Sti Radha Krishna. This Mela continues for seven days and the Daily Bhagwat Geeta Path continues in the evening and lots of shops of various items, and food stalls come on this time.

গৌরীয়া মঠ is a Hindu's religious place. It is located at Balurghat, Power House, D/Dinajpur. More precisely it is located at ক্রান্তি চক্র Club. It's a very calm and cool place. At every mornings around 5am-6am a team of monks who take the responsibilities come out for Nagar Kirtan. At every evening 6pm-8pm bhajan, Kirtan, Gita Path etc. are conducted. Many people around Balurghat town come here twice to thrice in week, where as locals come here daily, they also join the monks during Nagar Kirtan. At this math especially Lord Krishna, Lord Rama, Lord Vishnu are worshiped. A huge mela locally known as Jhulan Mela conducted evey year at month of August, on the auspicious occasion of Janmasthami (the birthday of Lord Krishna). This mela continues for around two weeks with lot's of enthusiasm. Every people irrespective of religion, age, sex and class join the mela. Hope you enjoy my comment. Thank you.👍💖

The Gaudiya Math is a Gaudiya Vaishnava matha formed on 6 September 1920, about 30 months after Bhaktisiddhanta Sarasvati took sannyasa, the renounced order of life.
Location: : 64 centers;
Founder: Bhaktisiddhanta Sarasvati
Established: 6 September 1920 (101 years ago)
Founded at: Calcutta, British India
Headquarters location: Kolkata
Official languages: Bengali, English
Purpose: Educational, Philanthropic, Religious studies, Spirituality

places_with_reviews.name: Chakvrigu Kalibari More
places_with_reviews.address: 6QH9+5CH, Shankar Mandal Rd, Chakvrigu, Balurghat, Mayamari, West Bengal 733102, India

reviews.text: My good memories are there

It may be considered as the center of Chakvrigu area of Balurghat, Dakshin Dinajpur.
Good place for hang out in the evenings. Many fast food stalls are there in that time of day.

It's inside the most jubilant marketplace, Newmarket, in the town Balurghat, West Dinajpure. It's lit in diyas throughout the day, and is always alive with the happy voices of worshippers, coming in from all around the otherwise quiet town.
Junction of thana more and chakvrigu bus stand.

Best place.
All fast food restaurants available here.
